marklogic.body: I'm an admitted tech junkie who actually reverted from a smartphone to a dumphone last summer, mainly to have an extra $50/mo. to put toward paying Off debt. However, I have an iPod Touch with me most of the time and have learned the Spots in town where I can readily access free wi-fi. Over the past 8 months, there have only been a handful of times when I've needed to get online but haven't been able to.
